author: mcpierce
msg: NO-JIRA: Removed Rakefile in favor of a gemspec file.
Since the Rakefile brought in dependencies that were ultimately
unnecessary, packaging was simplified to just using a gemspec file.
Updated the release.sh script to use the gemspec file.
